Reviews.Title: performs as advertised which is good these days when so many products don't
Reviews.Author: mark greef
Reviews.Content: This camera is affordable, easy to install and set up to access from my iphone and PC. The night vision is surprisingly good too. There are a variety of ways to set it for my surveillance needs and the manual gives examples of how most people would best use it. I've only had it in use about a month so we'll see if it lasts, but no problems yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert B Gamble
Reviews.Content: I own 7 other cameras just like this one and they cost about a hundred dollars more.....they were not worth the difference. These cameras are extremely easy to set up and very reliable.  I am going to order more.

Reviews.Title: Short range, motion detection not functional.
Reviews.Author: Gary Cotes
Reviews.Content: The range on this unit is about 15 ft, only get 5fps at that range. Forget getting anywhere near 30 ft or more. Returning mine. Also had problem with motion detection part of software... just doesn't work, everything is greyed out like it's not fully done yet. Maybe a later upgrade.
